SEARCH

Class MinHeap

java.lang.Object
MinHeap
public class MinHeap extends Object
An implementation of a MinHeap.

Uses an array to store the keys.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int[]
    keys
    An integer array that will hold the keys.
    private int
    size
    A field which will store the size of the heap.
